name: Asiko
description:
A classic stickman adventure that is reminiscent of the old Flash stickman games.

Play as Asiko and save your sister from General Crain. Utilize weapons and a grappling hook to traverse through levels and defeat bosses.

Outside assets:

  • Ambience, Night Wildlife, A.wav
  • NoSoapRadio
  • Alagard Font
  • Hand Winch Quick Release.wav
  • Torch
  • Crossbow Fire 1.wav
  • Arrow Impact 1.wav
  • Musket.wav
  • Helmet
  • Dialog Box
  • Gun Cock Sound
